verbs.description: if you [V: can] solve these math problems you are as smart as the world smartest teenagers and a couple tweens
if [ARG0: you] [ARGM-MOD: can] [V: solve] [ARG1: these math problems] you are as smart as the world smartest teenagers and a couple tweens
[ARGM-ADV: if you can solve these math problems] [ARG1: you] [V: are] [ARG2: as smart as the world smartest teenagers and a couple tweens]
